articles.title: Alice Guo: Fury as Filipino officials pose with 'China spy mayor'
articles.description: Disgraced ex-mayor Alice Guo flashes a wide smile and the peace sign in photos with her escorts.
articles.content:
By that time, Ms Guo had changed into an orange police detainee shirt. At the airport in Jakarta, she was casually dressed in a white striped t-shirt and jeans. She was also not in handcuffs.

articles.title: Hillside Endarasha Academy: 17 pupils killed in Kenya school fire, police say
articles.description: The cause of the fire at Hillside Endarasha Primary in Nyeri county is being investigated, police told local media.
articles.content:
At least 17 pupils have died after a school in central Kenya caught fire on Thursday night, police said.

articles.title: Atlanta rapper Rich Homie Quan dies

articles.title: Yagi: 'Catastrophic' super typhoon heads for southern China
articles.description: Yagi has doubled in strength after wrecking havoc in the northern Philippines early this week.

articles.title: New York police commissioner and other officials' homes raided

articles.title: Anger as concrete 'dam' appears on remote Cornish beach
articles.description: Residents near Whipsiderry beach have urged people to leave the beach to be "left wild".
articles.content:

articles.title: Father of boy held in Georgia school shooting is arrested
